title: Diamond Gold Bangles - Manikyam Kadiyalu
materials: featuring brilliant-cut diamonds. Gold purity is hallmarked for assurance. Diamonds are ethically sourced and graded for clarity and brilliance.
features: These kadiyalu feature a unique, contemporary design with evenly spaced diamonds set in a prong setting. The gold is textured for enhanced visual appeal and subtle light reflection, creating a rich golden hue. The simplistic style evokes timeless elegance, blending modern sensibilities with traditional South Indian gold craftsmanship.
colors: Predominantly gold with sparkling white diamonds. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the warmth of the gold
occasions: Perfect for daily wear and suitable for occasions like office parties
and festive celebrations like Sankranthi and Ugadi. A sophisticated choice for modern South Indian women.
description: This exquisite bangle set brings together the timeless beauty of gold with the brilliance of diamonds, crafting a look of both sophistication and cultural richness. The modern design with antique polish makes the bangle set unique and adds a touch of royalty to it. Each piece is handcrafted with meticulous detail, showcasing the fine workmanship of our Hyderabad artisans. A versatile piece that can transition from daily wear to special occasions.
